title: FS: T206 Jack Chesbro BVG 2 SOLD
author: Moonlight Graham

posts.post_title: FS: T206 Jack Chesbro BVG 2 SOLD
posts.post_content:
Nice front but the back has issues-no creases however. The price of this card seems to be skyrocketing, so my price seems reasonable. And the price is SOLD delivered PayPal friends/family please. Thank you.

Joe K

[IMG]http://www.net54baseball.com/attachment.php?attachmentid=514458&d=1651269961[/IMG]

[IMG]http://www.net54baseball.com/attachment.php?attachmentid=514459&d=1651269970[/IMG]

Hi Joe - can you please send me scans of the card to my e-mail?  The image looks a little fuzzy here but I’m guessing it’s just the photo, not the card 🤞

I’ll PM you my e-mail address

Thx!

Jeff
